User Stories: As a user, I would like to be able to visit InforMe through my web browser so that I can use it on the go.
As a user, I would like for the domain name to be catchy so that I can remember it easily.
As a user, I would like to be able to submit a URL and have a summary returned to me on the screen.
Tasks: Create appropriate HTML and CSS classes that interact with Python backend to display content.

User Stories: As a user, I would like for the backend to produce accurate summaries for most news websites.
Tasks: Create parsing tool that accurately scrapes sites like CNN and Guardian.

User Stories: As a user, I would like for the design to be easy-on-the eyes so that I can view on high-brightness screens with ease.
Tasks: Stylize website using different hues of gray.

User Stories: As a user, I would like to have the Android application reflect the colors and style of the webpage so that I have a uniform experience on all platforms.
Tasks: Adjust Android files to reflect the same hex codes used on the website.

User Stories: As a user, I would like to have access to relevant information in the footer of the index page, so that I can explore further mediums to contact the webpage developers.
Tasks: Create relevant social media connections to list in the footer of the website.

User Stories: As a user, I would like to be able to see random news articles at the touch of a button so that I can browse news articles quickly.
Tasks: Added a button to the android app that acesses an API to retrieve an article.

User Stories: As a user, I would like to be able to enter a URL from mobile so that I can use InforMe on the go.
Tasks: created an adroid app so that informe could be acessed from mobile.
